def_en: A footnote is a note at the bottom of a page in a book which provides more detailed information about something that is mentioned on that page.
If you refer to what you are saying as a footnote, you mean that you are adding some information that is related to what has just been mentioned.

def_cn: 无关紧要的事;次要事件
def_en: If you describe an event as a footnote, you mean that it is fairly unimportant although it will probably be remembered.
